function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate surveillance and monitoring of the population leading to unchecked spread of contagious diseases","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of communication and assurance regarding the use of collected data for communal benefit","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Accessibility and affordability issues with smart solutions leading to digital divide","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Smart technologies used for top-down pandemic containment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of transparency and ethical use of smart technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited access and usage of smart technologies in different social and political contexts","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on smart city technologies","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data privacy and security risks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Disparities in access to smart technologies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The potential exploitation of urban-rural relationships leading to adverse events","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decline in tax base of cities encouraging engagement in collaboration networks of cities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased reliance on smart solutions and icts for urban operations and quality of life improvement","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of trust in government initiatives","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure of state-centric initiatives","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fragmented urban governance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conflicting priorities of different government levels","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited financial resources for city-level governance","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fragmented governance leading to conflicting priorities in containing virus spread","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited local independence and high reliance on central government for coordination","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proactive planning and emergency plans in bangladesh","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Absence of economic and social support for poor, disadvantaged, and vulnerable groups","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to rapidly detect infected individuals through increased testing and improved surveillance","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disruption of food supply chains in cities due to transportation restrictions and border closures induced by covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decline in tax base of many cities due to the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for ineffective response actions and economic losses in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Poor and marginalized groups hit harder by the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Extreme vulnerability of cities to global pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Need for better self-sufficiency and diverse economic structures","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in tourism due to pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Negative impact on hotel industry in urban areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exacerbation of social disparities and inequalities","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diminished sense of community in cities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Neglect of border closure policies by rich urbanites","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Social inequalities and right to housing issues","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inequality and inequitable access to services can put the entire city at risk of further diffusion of the virus.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increase in social tensions caused by pandemics, leading to stigmatization and mental health problems for migrant communities.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Diminishing sense of community in some cities due to the pandemic.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited access to medical care for minority groups during pandemics","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor living and sanitary conditions in slums leading to difficulty in containing the spread of covid-19","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of access to medical care and basic services in informal developments","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Presence of covid-19 and other viruses in the sewage system","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Anthropogenic impacts on water resources","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Socio-economic impacts and social consequences of the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drugs used for treatment of covid-19 patients may pollute freshwater resources","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Coronavirus can spread through fecal-oral routes, requiring proper management of urban water cycle","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of sewage treatment facilities in densely populated areas like india poses challenges for containing the spread of covid-19 through water sources","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction of anthropogenic activities leading to improved water quality","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decrease in tourism activities leading to improved water quality in venice","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reduction in agricultural and industrial activities leading to improved groundwater quality in tuticorin, india","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Air pollution serving as a carrier for the virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"}]}
